aboutMe.description: Software Engineer with over 1 year of experience focused on web development.<space></space><space></space> I have solid skills and knowledge to create efficient and scalable web applications, using modern technologies to offer robust and high-performance solutions.

futseek.description: Explore live and date-specific football scores, find information about different leagues, players, teams, upcoming fixtures and previous matches, all in one place to keep you up to date.

movieverse.description: Movie-verse is a comprehensive platform designed for movie and TV lovers. Here you will find detailed information about your favorite movies and shows.

ecommerce.description: Ecommerce website, with user session, shopping cart, favorite products, orders, product management, orders administration and others.

footballquiz.description: Website Questions and Answers about soccer with score.

notys.description: Website of notes with login, creation of notes, editing of notes and removal of notes.

rickandmorty.description: Mobile app with information from characters and locations by Rick and Morty.
